channel.title: Android Studio on Arjun Krishna
channel.description: Recent content in Android Studio on Arjun Krishna

item.title: Express flowcharts android app
item.description: This app focuses on quickly creating colorful flowcharts , UMLs, and mindmaps. All of the app elements are gesture-based and intuitive making it very easy to use. This app also features an endless canvas that the user can pan and zoom.
